entry.title: Ben Gervais joins as Chief Technology Officer
entry.content: Ben Gervais, the CEO and Co-Founder of KeyFi and former Head of R&D at SelfKey, will be joining One Click as their new Chief Technology Officer (CTO). Ben brings a wealth of experience in AI, blockchain, and software development, making him the ideal leader to drive One Click’s technical innovation forward.Ben’s experience and expertise in AI and automation is unique and broad in scope. In 2017, he built a pre-GPT NLP research application, long before the AI revolution took hold. He continued his research into NLP with early testing of GPT-2 and joined OpenAI’s GPT-3 API Private Beta in 2021, being among the first in the world to lead the integration of generative AI into a web3 application (KeyFi Pro’s Market Analysis feature).In addition, he has explored the area of automation in software extensively, researching and developing a series of RPA bots in 2018 and more recently developing Bengine AI, an early prototype of an AI driven process automation system designed with a modular architecture for dynamic integrations. During the past 24 months since the release of ChatGPT, Ben has been working non-stop on AI R&D with a heavy focus on open source AI models, agent frameworks and other infrastructure and automation tools.His entrepreneurial spirit is equally impressive — besides being co-founder at KeyFi, in 2015 he co-founded a premium fan messaging app that grew to over 5 million users and generated $10M+ in annual recurring revenue (ARR).In the blockchain arena, Ben joined the SelfKey project in 2018, eventually becoming Head of R&D, leading research and prototyping projects in the areas of decentralized identity, verifiable credentials, proof of humanity, computational economic simulation, decentralized ecosystem architecture and more. Starting in 2020, Ben led the development of the KeyFi project, mainly the KeyFi pro app which connected a network of 14+ blockchains and 5,000+ digital assets into a multi-wallet, multi-chain, multi-platform, multi-asset DeFi management app with a wide range of features, many of which will be adapted and merged into the OneClick platform in the coming weeks and months.To keep up to date follow us on X, sign up to the early list HERE and join us in Discord!Ben Gervais joins as Chief Technology Officer was originally published in One Click Labs on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Introducing Fusion Protocol
entry.content: A novel DeFi protocol for customizable, modular, and fractional yield vaults by One Click.The One Click Fusion Protocol introduces a decentralized finance (DeFi) solution leveraging the ERC-7208 standard to create customizable fractionalized yield vaults by enabling the bundling, fractionalization, and dynamic management of yield-generating assets.This framework supports a modular asset management ecosystem. Features include advanced governance models, tiered risk strategies, auto-compounding, and loyalty incentives.The goal is to establish a scalable, efficient, and user-driven asset management protocol, aligning capital efficiency with community-centric decision-making.What is ERC-7208?The ERC-7208 standard, also known as the “On-Chain Data Container” standard, is an Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) designed to enhance the functionality and interoperability of tokens on the Ethereum blockchain, particularly focusing on managing on-chain data related to real-world assets (RWAs) and other complex token use cases.Core Concept:Decoupling Logic and Storage: ERC-7208 introduces a framework where the logic for managing on-chain data is abstracted from the storage, allowing for more flexible and adaptable smart contracts. This is achieved through:Data Objects (DOs): These are dedicated storage contracts that hold the underlying data.Data Managers (DMs): Interfaces or contracts that define the behavior or logic for interacting with Data Objects.Key Features:Modular Architecture: Allows for assets to be “wrapped” into Data Objects, making them adaptable to different token standards without changing the core data storage.Interoperability and Adaptability: Provides mechanisms for tokens to interact across different standards, facilitating the use of assets with existing protocols and dApps. Encodes data in bytes32 for broad compatibility with future data structures or types.Omnichain Capabilities: Assets can be traded across multiple blockchains simultaneously, enhancing liquidity and investor access.Compliance and Security: Implements hooks and triggers for automatic compliance with regulatory frameworks. Enhances security by separating data management from the asset’s core logic, reducing risks associated with smart contract vulnerabilities.Customization and Upgrades: Allows for the modification of an asset’s logic post-deployment, such as changing compliance rules or adapting to new standards without altering the data itself.One Click Fusion ProtocolWe have created a decentralized, community-governed asset management platform where users can build layered, custom yield vaults tailored to diverse risk and return profiles.By integrating yield-splitting and flexible governance, this protocol transforms DeFi into a user-controlled ecosystem that mirrors traditional finance’s ETF structures but operates with transparency, composability, and community involvement.The protocol aims to democratize decentralized asset management by:Community Ownership: Governed by users through token-based voting systems.Accessibility: Opening access to multi-strategy portfolios for users with varying capital levels.Transparency: Creating a fully auditable and community-drivenVault ArchitectureThere are two types of vaults that currently exist under this framework:Tokenized Vaults: Composite vaults are tokenized using ERC-7208, allowing seamless wrapping/unwrapping of assets.Multi-Tiered Vaults: Vault tiers align with user-defined risk and reward preferences with 4 tiers:Principal-Protected (Low Risk): Stable yields, capital preservation.Balanced Yield (Moderate Risk): Diversified strategies with a mix of stable and variable assets.Smart Yield (Advanced Risk): Delta-neutral strategies balancing risk and yield.Leveraged Yield (High Risk): Aggressive strategies for maximum yield potential.Rebalancing and FlexibilityThe protocol facilitates the creation and management of composite yield vaults through the use of ERC-7208, empowering users to bundle assets, combining yield-bearing tokens into a single vault token.This setup allows for fractional ownership, making shares of these complex vault structures liquid and tradeable. Additionally, the protocol supports dynamic rebalancing where community-driven governance regularly adjusts asset allocations to optimize performance.Users can also leverage Vault-as-a-Service (VaaS) to create custom vaults tailored to specific risk profiles and return objectives, which are then tokenized and can be traded on secondary markets.Yield MechanicsThe Fusion Protocol introduces innovative yield management where users can engage in Yield Futures to lock in future yield for immediate liquidity or speculative gain. Additionally, Perpetual Streams allow for the creation of continuous yield streams, providing a stable source of passive income.The system also features Auto-Compounding, which maximizes returns by automatically reinvesting earnings, harnessing the power of compounding to grow wealth within this fantasy-themed DeFi ecosystem.Where to from here?The future direction of One Click is set to expand into the realms of synthetic assets and real-world assets (RWAs), where we plan to introduce yield-backed vaults linked to commodities like gold, silver and carbon credits, alongside decentralized real estate investments that offer fractional ownership and income-sharing opportunities from tokenized properties.We aim to leverage AI-driven yield optimization, employing machine learning models to dynamically rebalance portfolios and maximize yields in response to shifting market conditions, while also providing personalized investment strategies tailored to individual user profiles.To enhance user engagement, we will introduce gamified elements, such as Achievement NFTs for rewarding governance participation and reaching significant milestones, alongside the Degen Vault Programs which will establish loyalty tiers that grant users exclusive rewards, increased yield multipliers, and a stronger voice in governance.Soon we will be releasing registration for Infinity Vault 001, which will be released in public closed beta and will be focused on simplified fractionalized yield with ERC-7208 based versions to follow in the future.This vault comes in partnership with 10 DeFi protocols with additional rewards multipliers available exclusively through One Click!To keep up to date follow us on X, sign up to the early list HERE and join us in Discord!Introducing Fusion Protocol was originally published in One Click Labs on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.
